column5: I was wondering if anyone had information on Grassy Narrows lake. I'm looking for a good lake map of the area, as well as some good places to try. I am going up there the first week in july. I've never been there before so it should be quite the adventure. If anyone has a good map or knows where I can get one I would really appreciate it. Also if anyone has been up there recently I would love to hear how you did. Thanks
Yeah you will want really big leeches and store them on your body to keep them fresh! Best of luck up there just watcht the falls!See ya buddy
I've guided on this water before. Fish the lower end of the fast water. Try leeches, glowing jigs.
Do you know where I could find a good lakemap?
